name: King Tut's Tomb Adventure (Comp-u-soft)
overview: Released as part of "Adventure I" game pack, this is another version of the original Pharaoh's Tomb Adventure where quest to loot King Tutankhamun's tomb and avoid the curse of the Mummy and get out alive. All this by flickering torchlight. So brush up on your snake charming, research how to defeat a Mummy and figure out what scares a goober. Pick up the treasures and get the treasures outside the pyramid to gain points. 175 points is 100% completion.
